ferris-wheel-scatter-plot-w-curve.png.description: Graph of a periodic wave passing through the points from our ferris wheel dataset with local minima at about (0,5), (30,5), (60,5), (90,5) and local maxima at about (15, 205), (45, 205), (75,205), and (105,205)
ferris-wheel-scatter-plot-w-curve.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap team, with contrived data using Desmos

wave-labeled-terms.png.description: Graph of a periodic wave, with a dashed midline cutting through the middle of the wave. The high points on the wave are labeled 'crests', the low points labeled 'valleys', the distance between peaks or valleys labeled 'period / wavelength, and the distance between the midline and a peak or valley labeled 'amplitude'
wave-labeled-terms.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap team, with contrived data
